segments.text: I'm feeling a real sense of unease watching this situation unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is a serious problem; the water is spreading so fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm worried about the damage it's doing to the wooden cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: More immediately, that puddle is going to make the floor incredibly slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is already in it; she could easily lose her footing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But my biggest concern right now is that boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those splayed legs look like they're about to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching so high, straining for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, he could really hurt himself, especially with a plate in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing so close, she might get caught in the fall too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a really dangerous situation, all happening right under the woman's nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to warn them before something terrible happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
